Allsangrock med et hjerte for dem som sliter
Blir det 칠n svensk plate jeg husker fra i 친r, er det denne.
01 Nov 2019, 15:27 by Geir Flat칮e

Avantgardet: 춺Mellan miljonprogram och Thailand췉 (Avantgardet/Border)
Med fire album siden 2016 har duoen Avantgardet for alvor sl친tt rot p친 den svenske indietoppen.
Da Rasmus Arvidsson vendte tilbake til Sverige etter fem 친r i Belfast og London, tok han kontakt med barndomsvennen Patrik 칀berg. Resultatet ble en plate om rusmisbruk, overdose og psykiske problem.


Avantgardet er i ferd med 친 f친 rykte som et legendarisk konsertband.游닝 Anton Lernst친l/Avantgardet

Arvidsson brukte musikken som en vei ut av elendigheten, og resultatet ble like selvutleverende nakent som det var melodi칮st flott. Han har fortsatt 친 skildre sitt eget liv, n칝rmest som hans landsmann Martin Kellerman i tegneserien om Rocky.
Kapittel fire er like sterkt de foreg친ende, men med et blikk som n친 retter seg mer utover. Arvidsson er hva Lundell, Hellstr칬m og Winnerb칛ck en gang var, bare balanserende p친 en enda skarpere egg.
Avantgardet kommer fra Nybro i Kalmar, og innspillingen er gjort i en l친ve p친 칐land. Dette er allsangrock med et hjerte for dem som sliter.
Beste spor: 춺Smutsen jag kommer fr친n췉, 춺Roundabout i sj칛lvtvivel췉, 춺Lock stock췉, 춺Nybro torg췉.
text:
Allsang rock with a heart for those who are struggling
Will this be one Swedish record I remember from this year?
01 Nov 2019, 15:27 by Geir Flat칮e



1 2 3 4 5 6
Avantgardet: "Between Million Program and Thailand" (Avantgardet / Border)
With four albums since 2016, the duo Avantgardet has really taken root on the Swedish indie top.
When Rasmus Arvidsson returned to Sweden after five years in Belfast and London, he contacted childhood friend Patrik 칀berg. The result was a record of substance abuse, overdose and mental health problems.


Avantgardet is gaining reputation as a legendary concert band.游닝 Anton Lernst친l / Avantgardet

Arvidsson used the music as a way out of the misery, and the result was as self-giving naked as it was melodically wonderful. He still has to portray his own life, almost like his compatriot Martin Kellerman in the cartoon about Rocky.
Chapter four is just as strong as the previous ones, but with a look that is now moving more outward. Arvidsson is what Lundell, Hellstr칬m and Winnerb칛ck once were, just balancing on an even sharper egg.
The avant-garde comes from Nybro in Kalmar, and the recording is done in a barn on 칐land. This is all-around rock with a heart for those who are struggling.
Best tracks: "The dirt I come from", "Roundabout in self-doubt", "Lock stock", "Nybro torg".
